typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as string,
		ReturnDate as string,
		RentalCost as string,
		LateFee as string,
		RewindFlag as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true) ~> transactionStream
transactionStream derive(RentalDate = toDate(RentalDate, 'yyyymmdd')
,
		ReturnDate = toDate(ReturnDate, 'yyyymmdd')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
